BasicInfo.short: MyHealthTeams creates social networks for chronic condition communities.

Products.name: DiabetesTeam
Products.description: The social network for those living with type 2 diabetes.

Products.name: MyLupusTeam
Products.description: The social network for people living with lupus.

Products.name: MyMSTeam
Products.description: MyMSTeam The social network and support group for those who have multiple sclerosis (MS)

news.title: MyHealthTeams Lands $3.3M To Bring Mobile-Friendly Social Networks To Those Living With Chronic Health Conditions | TechCrunch
4 reasons Facebook doesn’t work for healthcare | VentureBeat | Health | by Tom Cheredar

Products.name: MyBCTeam
Products.description: MyBCTeam (MyBreastCancerTeam) welcomes all women who have been diagnosed with breast cancer.

news.title: MyHealthTeams Lands $3.3M To Bring Mobile-Friendly Social Networks To Those Living With Chronic Health Conditions | TechCrunch
4 reasons Facebook doesn’t work for healthcare | VentureBeat | Health | by Tom Cheredar

Products.name: MyEndometriosisTeam
Products.description: The social network for women living with endometriosis.

Products.name: MyHemophiliaTeam
Products.description: The social network for those living with hemophilia and other bleeding disorders.

Products.name: MyParkinsonsTeam
Products.description: The social network for those living with Parkinson's.

Products.name: MyFibroTeam
Products.description: The social network for those living with fibromyalgia.

Products.name: MyCrohnsAndColitisTeam
Products.description: The social network for those living with Crohn's or colitis, and for parents of children diagnosed with Crohn's or colitis.

Products.name: MyPsoriasisTeam
Products.description: The social network for those living with psoriasis or psoriatic arthritus.
